verbs.description: [ARG0: Parents] [R-ARG0: who] [V: cross] [ARGM-MNR: illegally] [ARGM-DIR: from Mexico] [ARGM-MNR: with their children] will be prosecuted and their children put into protective custody in a dramatic crackdown quietly ordered late last week by Trump 's DHS .

Parents who cross illegally from Mexico with their children [V: will] be prosecuted and their children put into protective custody in a dramatic crackdown quietly ordered late last week by Trump 's DHS .

Parents who cross illegally from Mexico with their children will [V: be] prosecuted and their children put into protective custody in a dramatic crackdown quietly ordered late last week by Trump 's DHS .

[ARG1: Parents who cross illegally from Mexico with their children] [ARGM-MOD: will] be [V: prosecuted] and their children put into protective custody [ARGM-LOC: in a dramatic crackdown quietly ordered late last week by Trump 's DHS] .

Parents who cross illegally from Mexico with their children will be prosecuted and [ARG1: their children] [V: put] [ARG2: into protective custody] [ARGM-LOC: in a dramatic crackdown quietly ordered late last week by Trump 's DHS] .

Parents who cross illegally from Mexico with their children will be prosecuted and their children put into protective custody in [ARG1: a dramatic crackdown] [ARGM-MNR: quietly] [V: ordered] [ARGM-TMP: late last week] [ARG0: by Trump 's DHS] .
